name: Blood of Magic
description: Blood of Magic is a small open world role-playing game with turn-based battles. Other elements include crafting, town management, recruitment, and exploration which help improve your experience in Auguston.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 (64-Bit Only) Processor: Intel Core Duo 2.4Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: ATI HD5450 DirectX: Version 11
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 (64-Bit Only) Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 Processor Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 DirectX: Version 11
